channel.title: Ora Browser Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.2.11
item.description:
Ora Browser v0.2.11

Changes since last release:

Features

  • feat(setup): add navigation to parent directory before running xcodegen — Kenenisa Alemayehu

Fixes

  • fix: use specific failing URL from error info for navigation failures (#198) — Danil Kazakov

Chores

  • chore(docs): remove HOSTING_SETUP.md documentation — Kenenisa Alemayehu

Other

  • Update feature_request.yml — Yonathan Dejene
  • Revise support section and add roadmap — Yonathan Dejene
  • refactor(pre-push): update script path to use subdirectory — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • refactor(git-blame): remove `.git-blame-ignore-revs` file — Kenenisa Alemayehu
